Name: Boom for Mac
Tagline: Present & record with branded live layout changes
Description: Boom is the video app for coaches, creators, and founders who present on camera. Present live on Zoom, Meet, or Teams with pro layouts and cinematic transitions. Record tutorials, demos, and courses that are finished when you stop talking. A simple OBS alternative and Loom alternative with virtual camera and webcam enhancements built in. No editing. No timeline. No post-production. Mac only.

Name: Burner Note
Tagline: Zero knowledge self destructing notes
Description: Send private notes that automatically delete after reading. End-to-end AES-256 encryption in your browser. Zero-knowledge architecture means we can't read your messages. Free, open source, no tracking.

Name: Pane
Tagline: The AI that works directly in your spreadsheet's grid
Description: The first agentic spreadsheet where AI edits cells and formulas with human-level precision.

Name: Settle It
Tagline: Quick polls to settle small decisions
Description: Settle It is a simple way to make quick polls and share them with a link. Type a question in one line, send the link to friends or family, and see the result as votes come in. It‚Äôs designed for everyday decisions like where to eat, when to meet, or what to do next. No accounts, no setup, no friction. Make a poll. Share the link. Decide.

Name: SkreenPro

Topics: Open Source, Social Media, Marketing, GitHub
Description: Capture screenshots, annotate with powerful tools, and share instantly. The beautiful, free, and open source screenshot tool built for creators and developers.

Name: HtmlDrag

Name: VPN Peek
Tagline: See if your VPN is actually working from your menu bar
Description: VPN Peek monitors your VPN status from the macOS menu bar and detects DNS & IPv6 leaks. Get instant notifications when your VPN drops or your traffic leaks. Works with any VPN provider. $3.99, pay once.

Name: Warbl - Engage faster on X

Name: Tangle

Description: Grow into who you want to become‚Äîset everyday intentions, get support from your people, and watch your story unfold. Tangle is a new kind of social network, designed for intentional living.

Name: JusBook - Scheduler

Description: Most scheduling tools stop at booking meetings. JusBook is built as a Scheduling OS. Name: Press Release Library

Description: Press Release Examples Library helps founders and marketers generate realistic press release examples by announcement type, such as funding, product launches, and company updates. Instead of generic templates, you get newsroom-style examples and editable structures you can copy and adapt for your own announcement. Name: OneBookList.com
Tagline: Book recommendations with the story behind them.
Description: Recently, I struggled to find a meaningful next read. Traditional lists felt noisy, and I wanted something more personal. So I asked one simple question: If you could recommend only one book to another soul, what would it be and why? The responses were surprising. Everyone seems to have one book they‚Äôd put above all others. OneBookList is a place to share that single, life-changing pick - so the shelf grows with only the best recommendations, each with a personal story.

Name: GitHub
Tagline: Privacy-focused local developer toolkit, a gift to all devs
Description: Privacy-focused local developer toolkit: JSON/YAML formatters, regex tester, diff viewer, JWT decoder & more - susamn/helpful-tools-v2

Name: Helm Analytics
Tagline: Website Intelligence Platform with AI and Security Built-In
Description: Traditional analytics stops at measuring. Helm Analytics starts there. This is a Website Intelligence platform that integrates proactive security directly into your metrics. While others just count visitors, Helm identifies bots in real-time, blocks malicious scrapers with its 'Shield' firewall, and uses AI to surface deep traffic quality anomalies. It‚Äôs not just a dashboard; it‚Äôs a tactical command center for your site‚Äôs growth and defense 100% open-source and cookie-free.

Name: MoneyRank
Tagline: A daily game that sharpens your money decisions.
Description: MoneyRank is a daily financial decision game. Each day, you rank 4 real-world money choices, from investing and debt to insurance and emergencies. Get instant feedback, a score, and see how your thinking compares to others. It‚Äôs not about ‚Äúright answers.‚Äù It‚Äôs about learning how you think, spotting risky patterns, and improving financial judgment through short, fun daily challenges.

Name: Onyx Vision
Tagline: An iPhone app that edits videos by typing
Description: An iPhone app that lets you edit videos by just typing what you want. "remove the person in the background" "add fireworks" "make it anime style" type it. wait 3 minutes. save to your camera roll. -remove people or objects from videos -add elements that weren't there -transform the entire style (anime, vintage, cyberpunk, whatever) all from your iPhone. no timelines, no tutorials. -pick a video from your camera roll -type what you want -AI processes it (~3 min) -save to phone

Name: WinkLink
Tagline: One link. Multiple profiles. Total privacy.
Description: WinkLink lets you create multiple profiles inside one bio link ‚Äî so you share the right version of yourself in the right place. Use a professional profile for LinkedIn, a social profile for Instagram, and a personal profile for private contacts. Your phone and email stay hidden until you approve requests. Add rich link previews, achievements, and enjoy a clean, animated UI. One link. Multiple identities. Full control.

Name: ScribblePadGames

Name: PayChasers
Tagline: Stop chasing clients for payment. Automate it.

Name: Expense6
Tagline: Organize finances with Workzones. Invoice, track & share.
